properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 3:15PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
snow fall increasing Friday afternoon and night.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Grand Coulee, Odessa, Wilbur, and Coulee City.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest accumulating snow will occur along
the highway 2 corridor and along Interstate 90 east of Sprague.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY
